root.title: Khanan Khad inscriptions of Yamaan Us gorge, The
root.place: Inscriptions discovered in the Khanan Khad on the cliff of Yamaghan Usun, Altai somon of Khovd district, Mongolia. N-
root.general: There are some old Turkic inscriptions found on the cliff.
root.description: Inscriptions are on flat surfaces of the cliff.
root.investigation: The inscriptions were investigated and published by E.A.Novgorodova, E.R.Tenishev in 1873. Tseveendorzh in 1981, and N.Bayarhuu in 2009 619.

pdf.f_title: Ямаан усны хавцлын Ханан хаднаас шинээр илрүүлсэн бичээсүүд
